hero_section.title: Web Applications
hero_section.subtitle: Scalable, Responsive & Future-Ready
hero_section.description: We design and build modern web applications with powerful backends, intuitive interfaces, and scalable cloud infrastructure, tailored to your business needs.

introduction_section.heading: What is
content: At Devisgon, we specialize in building custom web applications that combine engaging frontends, secure APIs, and high-performance backends. Our apps are responsive, SEO-friendly, and optimized for cloud scalability, ensuring they perform seamlessly across devices.
We serve industries such as finance, healthcare, logistics, SaaS, and e-commerce, helping companies launch platforms that handle everything from real-time analytics to large-scale user engagement.

key_benefits_section.title: Key Benefits
key_benefits_section.subtitle: Transform your operations with proven results

cards.title: Responsive & Accessible
cards.description: Optimized for desktop, mobile, and tablets with clean UI/UX.

cards.title: Custom Features
cards.description: Tailored modules like dashboards, CRMs, booking systems, or marketplaces.

cards.title: Scalable
cards.description: Designed to grow with your business, handling millions of users if needed.

cards.title: Secure & Reliable
cards.description: Built with industry-standard encryption and compliance.

case_study_section.headline: 50K Users, 30% Sales Growth with Custom Web App

content.label: problem
content.text: A fast-growing e-commerce company needed a scalable platform to handle thousands of daily users and real-time inventory updates.

content.label: Solution
content.text: We developed a custom web application with React frontend, Node.js backend, and integrated payment gateways.

content.label: Result
content.text: The platform scaled to 50,000+ monthly users with a 30% increase in sales and improved customer satisfaction.

questions.question: Can you build apps for both iOS and Android?
questions.answer: Typically, an MVP can be developed in 4-6 weeks depending on the complexity of the features.

questions.question: How secure are your enterprise solutions?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer post-launch maintenance and support packages to ensure your application runs smoothly.

questions.question: Do you work with existing ERP/CRM systems?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in integrating AI models into existing architectures via API.

questions.question: Can you scale apps as our business grows?
questions.answer: We primarily use Next.js, React, Node.js, Python, and cloud services like AWS or Vercel.
